roleset.name: dig (deeply)
roleset.note: DELVE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls rummage-35.5. (from delve.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Achenbaum, too, delves into his clients' business.

example.name: with adverb
example.text: John delved deeply into Mary's diary.

example.name: transitive usage
example.text: I have delved the deep recesses of my mind and once sought the help of a clinical psychologist who specialized in hypnotic recreation of past incidents .
example.arg: the deep recesses of my mind
